answers.author: William Lutz
answers.text:
You might want to get your law director/solicitor's opinion in on this one.  In one community I worked in, one of our board members was out of town and we did a video teleconference of the meeting which our prosecutor said would be okay.  But to simply phone in a vote, our prosecutor didn't recommend that course of action.
